clinical_study.brief_title: An Randomized Open-Label PK Study of LY03004 Compared to Risperdal® Consta® in Stable Patients With Schizophrenia or Schizoaffective Disorder
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-Label Pharmacokinetic Study of LY03004 Compared to Risperdal® Consta® Following a Single Intramuscular Injection at 25 mg or 50 mg in Stable Patients With Schizophrenia and/or Schizoaffective Disorder

brief_summary.textblock: A review of the amount of drug in your blood over time.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax for the Pharmacokinetics (PK) of Risperdal® Consta®

facility.name: Neuropsychiatric Research Center of Orange County
